name: storejs
description: Local storage localstorage package provides a simple API

scripts.build:min: umd store lib/store.js | uglifyjs | bannerjs -o > dist/store.min.js
scripts.build:dist: umd store lib/store.js | bannerjs -m | uglifyjs -b beautify=true --comments 'all' > dist/store.js
scripts.build: npm run build:min && npm run build:dist

author: kenny wang <wowohoo@qq.com>
